00395 inline IInteractiveShape* CViewBase::GetMouseShapePtr() const
00396 {
00397        if (!m_isMouseShapeValid){
00398               CalcMouseShape();
00399               m_isMouseShapeValid = true;
00400        }
00401        return m_mouseShapePtr;
00402 }

00438 
00439 inline ILayer& CViewBase::GetLayer(int index) const
00440 {
00441        if (GetLayersCount() <= 0){
00442               CViewBase* view = const_cast<CViewBase*> (this);
00443               view->InsertDefaultLayers();
00444        }
00445 
00446        I_ASSERT((index >= 0) && (index < int(m_layers.size())));
00447 
00448        ILayer* layerPtr = m_layers[index];
00449        I_ASSERT(layerPtr != NULL);
00450 
00451        return *layerPtr;
00452 }

00539 inline void CViewBase::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
00540 {
00541        if (state != m_isBackgroundBufferValid){
00542               if (!state){
00543                      m_invalidatedBox = GetClientRect();
00544               }
00545               m_isBackgroundBufferValid = state;
00546        }
00547 }
00548
